name: Royal Racing [Demo]
description:
This is a demo / prototype of my future game Royal Racing. It will be a  online multiplayer racing game, and a 3d platformer. 

In the full version, I will also add more levels and cutomization (hats, color, shoes, ...).

If you played this prototype, please don't forget to tell me your feedback in the comments or here.

I will continue working on this game only if more than 100 people play and like the game. You can follow me on itch.io to know if I reach this goal.

Controls :

If you use the keyboard :

  • WASD / ZQSD to move
  • Space to jump

If you use a controller (Xbox) :

  • L Stick to move
  • A to jump or start a new game

This game is made with Godot !
